title: Rectangular Crop Fields. Lake Elwell, Montana, USA.
description:
The numerous rectangular crop fields near Lake Elwell, Montana are part of the Golden Triangle, an area encompassing Havre, Shelby, and Great Falls. This region produces around 45% of Montana’s wheat crop.
Greener rectangles signify fields that will be harvested later in the fall.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
